text: Nihsandehe yara musalamana hayeche ebam yara ihudi, nasara o sabe'ina, (tadera madhya theke) yara imana eneche allahara prati o kiyamata dibasera prati ebam satkaja kareche, tadera jan'ya rayeche tara sa'oyaba tadera palanakartara kache. Ara tadera kona'i bhaya-bhiti ne'i, tara duhkhita'o habe na.
